com.facebook.litho.sections.widget

Interface RecyclerConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GridRecyclerConfiguration, ListRecyclerConfiguration, StaggeredGridRecyclerConfiguration

    public interface RecyclerConfiguration
    A configuration object the RecyclerCollectionComponent will use to determine which layout manager should be used for the RecyclerView
